text: Cagliari Calcio is a football club which plays in Italy. ==Name== *1920-1924 Cagliari F.C. *1924-1935 C.S. Cagliari *1935-1970 U.S. Cagliari *1970-present Cagliari Calcio ==League title== *Serie A : 1 **1969/70 *Serie B : 1 **2003/04 *Serie C / Serie C1 : 3 **1930/31, 1951/52, 1988/89 ==League position== Season League Position 2000/01 Serie B 11th 2001/02 Serie B 12th 2002/03 Serie B 8th 2003/04 Serie B Champions 2004/05 Serie A 10th 2005/06 Serie A 14th 2006/07 Serie A 17th 2007/08 Serie A 14th 2008/09 Serie A 9th ===Former position=== Category:Italian football clubs Category:1920 establishments in Italy Category:Cagliari
